data.name: Aim Lab -Elite Supporter Pack
data.detailed_description:
A new avatar frame wrapped in gold, as well as 7 New Golden Weapon Skins
  • Guardian Blaster
  • Light Blaster
  • Deagle
  • High Noon Revolver
  • Pulse Rifle
  • LG
  • Justice
  • Tactical Shotgun
  • Bio-dart Rifle
  • Venom

    About Aim Lab
    • Aim Lab learns and identifies your core strengths and weaknesses
    • Skills and tasks adapt to your play using AI to optimize your individual progression
    • See play-by-play results and targeted tips for improvement
    • Compare your FPS skills — agnostic to game title — to other players and the pros
    • Rank and compete on the Aim Lab leaderboards
    • Fully customize your training with creator tools for custom tasks

    Aim Lab is still in early beta. Contribute to the project by posting on our Steam forums or by joining our Discord!

    • Skills and tasks adapt to your play using AI to optimize your individual progression
    • See play-by-play results and targeted tips for improvement
    • Compare your FPS skills — agnostic to game title — to other players and the pros

data.short_description: Train like the champion that you will become. The Aim Lab Elite Supporter Pack includes your user avatar and 7 weapons wrapped in champion’s gold.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7/8/10
  • Processor: Intel® Core™ 2 Duo E6600 or AMD Phenom™ X3 8750 processor or better
  • Memory: 4 MB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 560 and up
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 7/8/10
  • Processor: Intel® Core™ 2 Duo E6600 or AMD Phenom™ X3 8750 processor or better
  • Memory: 4 MB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 560 and up
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
